commandPrompts: **TIP:** Have a bug you want to report? Type `t.reportbug <bug>` and send us a bug report.
**TIP:** Want to suggest something for TimBot? Type `t.suggest <suggestion>` and suggest us something!
**TIP:** Are you not seeing any audit logs from TimBot 9999? Make sure you set a channel name to `timbot-logs` to receive logs from me. (the converse applies too)
**TIP:** There are a ton of subcommands for each command. Type `t.help <command>` for whichever command you're interested in.
This bot will always have bugs and errors. If you ever catch one (most likely when finding code block responses from me), please report it using `t.reportbug`.
**SHAMELESS PLUG:** Interested in TimBot and want to be the first to receive updates? Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/q439qazkT5

pickup: you and I are like nachos with jalapeños. I'm super cheesy, you're super hot, and we belong together.
you look so familiar. Didn't we take a class together? I could've sworn we had chemistry.
are you a CS:GO map? Because you are de_licious.
I'm good at algebra; I can replace your X and you wouldn't need to figure out Y.
I've got 1-ply, I've got 2-ply, but all I really want is your re-ply.
if nothing lasts forever, will you be my nothing?
have you been covered in bees recently? I just assumed, because you look sweeter than honey.
you must be a campfire. Because you're super hot and I want s'more.
well here I am. What are your other two wishes?
if you and I were socks, we'd make a great pair!
are you a long structure used to restrict the flow of water across rivers and underwater streams? Because daaaaaaaaam!
my name's Microsoft. Can I crash at your place?
you must be a high test score. Because I want to take you home and show you to my mother.
you must be an orphanage because I need to give you a couple of kids.
I think you're suffering from a lack of Vitamin me.
if you were a burger at McDonalds, you'd be the McGorgeous.
I'm not trying to impress you or anything, but... I'm batman!
my love for you is just like diarrhea; I just can't hold it in.
are you a minecart? 'Cause I wanna ride you all day.
are you an ATM? 'Cause I'd like my credit card to go in and outta your slot.
are you mixed? 'Cause you look half fine, half mine.
I’d never play hide and seek with you because someone like you is impossible to find.
your hand looks heavy. Can I hold it for you?
let me tie your shoes, cause I dont want you falling for anyone else.
why match profile pictures when we can match last names?
are you a Minecraft fence? Because I can't get over you.
I love you.
how do I get STUD? I have STD and U are all I need.
are you a bank loan? 'Cause you have my interest.
my dick is so polite… it stands up so you can sit down.
what genre of music do you like? Wait, why not heavy metal? I can make you learn how to scream.
are you a jalapeño? 'Cause all you take is one taste to make me feel all hot inside.
are you a light switch? You keep turning me on every time you're around.
you're like a fine wine; the more I drink from you, the hotter I feel.
are you a torch? 'Cause you light up my world.
you’re the "nothing" I tell my mom when she asks me why I’m smiling at my phone so much.
are you my appendix? 'Cause I don't really understand how you work, but this feeling in my stomach makes me want to take you out.
dadjoke: Two guys walked into a bar. The third guy ducked.
Why are elevator jokes so classic and good? They work on many levels.
What did the police officer say to his belly-button? You’re under a vest.
What did Tennessee? The same thing as Arkansas.
My wife asked me to go get 6 cans of Sprite from the grocery store. I realized when I got home that I had picked 7 up.
Why do some couples go to the gym? Because they want their relationship to work out.
Did you hear about the kidnapping at school? It’s fine, he woke up.
Why did the man fall down the well? Because he couldn’t see that well.
I used to hate facial hair, but then it grew on me.
Dogs can’t operate MRI machines. But catscan.
Why is cold water so insecure? Because it’s never called hot.
I was going to tell a time-traveling joke, but you guys didn’t like it.
Stop looking for the perfect match... use a lighter.
What did the drummer call his twin daughters? Anna One, Anna Two!
Want to hear a joke about construction? I’m still working on it.
Someone told me that I should write a book. I said, "That's a novel concept."
What’s Forrest Gump’s password? 1forrest1
Why are spiders so smart? They can find everything on the web.
What does a house wear? Address.
When my wife told me to stop impersonating a flamingo, I had to put my foot down.
What do you call a fish with no eyes? A fsh.
The other day I was listening to a song about superglue, it's been stuck in my head ever since.
I knew I shouldn't steal a mixer from work, but it was a whisk I was willing to take.

dude. are you fucking kidding me?
stop trying to make me say yes
stop trying to make me say no
you have literally ZERO chance of that happening
things might actually work out for you
ask me that again, i think my code broke again
if you think so, then i think so!
did you cry after watching that one Violet Evergarden episode?
maybe? im too focused on writing pickup lines
